title: WTB/WTTF T201s - 13 to complete my set!
author: t206fix

posts.post_title: WTB/WTTF T201s - 13 to complete my set!
posts.post_content:
I need 14 cards to complete my set of t201 Mecca Double Folders.  If you have any that you are willing to part with / sell / trade, please let me know.  I prefer SGC, but would be interested in whatever you have.  

Here is my list (only one HOF):

Walter Johnson/Street - HOF
Leifeld/Simon
McCabe/Starr
Hickman/Hinchman
Woodruff/Williams
Gaspar/Clarke
Chase/Sweeney
Kling/Cole
Thomas/Coombs
Rucker/Daubert
Donovan/Straud
Foster/Ward
Leach/Gibson
Laporte/Stephens

Thanks,

Tony

Gaspar/Clark is up on ebay now - 221184751698
as is McCard/Starr - 130845679953
Currently less than $10.00

They are both PSA, but you could easily flip over to SGC...

I have this Clarke/Gaspar up on ebay....ends Sunday.
Not $10 but looks much, much better:D

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/271150445123?ssPageName=STRK:MESELX:IT&_trksid=p3984.m1555.l2649[/url]
Thanks for the leads guys.  I've got my bids in!

I've got the following two that are available... PM me if you're interested and your current bids don't meet with success, and best of luck with your set completion!

Leifield/Simon

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/gspinf/forsaletrade/othertcards/websize/9113.jpg[/IMG]

Clarke/Gaspar

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/gspinf/forsaletrade/othertcards/websize/10795.jpg[/IMG]

I always felt the Leifield/Simon was undergraded, but I'm biased :D

--
Mike
